overview: Implementation of an area-reduced floating point variable dimension size (square) matrix multiplication. In this version, the code is parallelized less which results in less resource usage (to fit on smaller devices, or allow for more functions to be accelerated). Matrix dimension is a parameter to the function 'mmult_accel()'. By default the function 'mmult_accel()' is marked for hardware, and you can build the project. SDSoC pragmas are used to specify the amount of data that will be transferred to the accelerator.
